column4: if I find a program that is not installable via apt-get, is it ok to just install it by downloading the file?
no, someone didn't recommend those backlinks? is it really bad to install software manually
it's preferred to use packages, or if you build from source, to use checkinstall to build a nice .deb from it
could you clarify how I use checkinstall
i'm a noob, cc is not installed. checkinstall only said it depended on "Make" so I installed those
this time it got alot further, but came to an error at "checking for libz" error: not found
you'll need to install that too
